margin-top: 6px; margin-bottom: 6px; font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, system-ui, ".sfnstext-regular", sans-serif; font-size: 14px; background-color: #ffffff;

b.font: NCP will remain closed and distance learning will take place through Friday, April 24. At this time, classes are scheduled to resume on Monday, April 27.

p.style: margin-top: 6px; margin-bottom: 6px; font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, system-ui, ".sfnstext-regular", sans-serif; font-size: 14px; background-color: #ffffff;
margin-top: 6px; margin-bottom: 6px; font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, system-ui, ".sfnstext-regular", sans-serif; font-size: 14px; background-color: #ffffff;

span.br: With the extension of distance learning, schools will continue to implement consistent methods to deliver instruction remotely to students in ELA and Math. District Government will work with schools to address challenges where they exist and develop.

div.style: display: inline; font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, system-ui, ".sfnstext-regular", sans-serif; font-size: 14px; background-color: #ffffff;

b.br: Due to the extended school closures, OSSE plans to seek a one-year waiver from federal Every Student Succeeds Act (ESSA) requirements around assessments, and will cancel statewide summative assessments for students, including Partnership for Assessment of Readiness for College and Careers (PARCC) and DC Science.

p.b: Please follow all CDC guidelines regarding staying safe and continuing with staying out of crowds and staying at home in order to flatten the curve of further outbreaks of this serious virus.
NCP WILL continue to serve food each day from 9:00 am - 12:00 pm each day beginning March 24th.

p.style: color: #1c1e21; font-family: inherit; font-weight: 300; margin-top: 6px; margin-bottom: 6px;

font.b: Future updates on National Prep's opening status will be shared through our website, social media, telecommunications and news outlets. Please be safe and feel free to contact the school at 202-832-7737 for questions. As always we appreciate our partnership with you in serving our students.

div.noscript: Javascript must be enabled to view the Photo Album on this page.

div.style: display:block; float: left; overflow: hidden; width:67.25%;

font.style: color: #444444; font-family: roboto, sans-serif; font-weight: 300; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal;

div.font: National Prep was founded on the basis to provide students with a great high school education. It is our goal to teach students to be life-long learners and give them the ability to succeed in college and become productive young adults within their communities. National Collegiate Prep serves all DC residents.

font.style: color: #444444; font-family: roboto, sans-serif; font-weight: 300; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal;

br.font: It is our goal to provide a well-rounded educational experience for our students to include a rigorous college prep curriculum to prepare our students for college and give them an international experience including opportunities to travel abroad and learn about other cultures and customs while attending National Collegiate Prep.

h2.style: color: #444444; font-family: roboto, sans-serif; font-weight: 300; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal;

ul.style: color: #444444; font-family: roboto, sans-serif; font-weight: 300; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal;
ul.li: Every student can achieve and meet high academic standards regardless of their learning ability, style or socio-economic status
Parental and community involvement is an essential ingredient for student achievement
Small schools promote improved student outcomes
Instructional methods must support the varied learning styles of students
